divs: sighting detailsi was sitting outside at a friend's house waiting for the city fireworks to begin. the location was about half a mile west of a major interstate, in a country setting. there were approximately 20 people outside at the same time at this particular house. someone pointed an object out in the sky, to the south west of us. at first we thought it was a plane due to the speed it was traveling and where it was located in the sky.(there is a small city airport nearby, and a larger airport in a city northwest of this area) if it had been a large airliner, we should have been able to see details of it, as it wasn't all that high in the sky, but we couldn't. almost at once, everyone realized it was quite bright, an orangish color, and looked like it had flames, or some kind of glare shooting out or off of the top, but it also appeared to be glowing. at first i thought, oh no, this is a plane on fire and i thought it was looking for a place to land or it might crash but then i thought, well, this plane doesn't act like it's in trouble. there wasn't any erratic movements, it just continued flying smoothly. it seemed to be traveling south to north but as it passed by to the west of us, we were still unable to make out any distinguishing features. at no point did it lose any altitude. we did not have any sun glare in our eyes as it was cloudy\overcast, we just couldn't see anything except the glare\brightness of the object. the object continued to move north and then seemed to turn somewhat west and gain altitude, as it appeared to be stationary in the sky, but was getting smaller. it looked like it was moving up and away from us. we watched until we could no longer see anything at all. (a second group of people next door appeared to be watching the object as well) i should also mention, that at no time, could we hear any noise during this whole event. i took one picture with my cell phone. now, i don't know what to think it was. i do believe that there are other life forms we don't know about yet, but did this have anything to do with that? i have no idea. the attachment was taken with a samsung sch-u340 phone with a vga-camera. the resolution was 320x240, the white balance was "cloudy", the quality was "fine", the color effects were "normal". if you can open it, and then enlarge it, you will see what looks like a star with a reddish glow coming off the upper left corner. it also appears to have some sort of heat signature emitting from the entire surface, all of the way around it.
Summary: Fireball type object moving north west witnessed by a group of people.
